name: @cameronhunter/zod-args-parser
description: A CLI argument parser using `zod` for validation

scripts.build:commonjs: rm -rf lib/commonjs lib/*.commonjs.tsbuildinfo && tsc -p tsconfig.build.commonjs.json && echo '{ "type": "commonjs" }' > lib/commonjs/package.json
scripts.build:module: rm -rf lib/module lib/*.module.tsbuildinfo && tsc -p tsconfig.build.module.json && echo '{ "type": "module" }' > lib/module/package.json
scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:module
